channel.title: How can I be informed of new Tokens created on Radix?
channel.description:
New Tokens are being created on the Radix network every week for new and exciting upcoming projects. Here are some resources to be informed of new and existing tokens:
**RadixScan** RadixScan offers a full ordered list of all the tokens ever created on the Radix Network [https://www.radixscan.io/TokenTable.shtml](https://www.radixscan.io/TokenTable.shtml)
**CaviarNine** CaviarNine's twitter bot, tweets any new coins minted as soon as they are created on the Radix ledger. Follow them at [https://twitter.com/CaviarNine](https://twitter.com/CaviarNine) to be informed as soon as it happens.
